channel.title: [508] Help with adding customs
channel.description: [size=12pt][font=courier]I'm trying to find out how to add models, gfx's, emote's to my 508 server (such as chaotic maul and other newer runescape items) and i have absolutely no clue where to start. I tried looking up tutorials but they seem to be out of date or just not what i'm looking for. If someone could give me some links or tutorials or just help me through an easy example that would be greatly appreciated. thanks :)[/font][/size]

item.title: [508] Help with adding customs
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:

[size=12pt][font=courier]I’m trying to find out how to add models, gfx’s, emote’s to my 508 server (such as chaotic maul and other newer runescape items) and i have absolutely no clue where to start. I tried looking up tutorials but they seem to be out of date or just not what i’m looking for. If someone could give me some links or tutorials or just help me through an easy example that would be greatly appreciated. thanks :)[/font][/size]
